IndexPage.description: Premium class services and courses for beginners and professionals.
IndexPage.title: Eyelash extension master with 5 years of experience

Master.title: About the master
Master.description:
Hello!

My name is Anastasia and I am a certified eyelash extension artist with over 5 years of experience.

My main goal is to help each client feel confident and beautiful. My professional journey began with a sincere desire to create beauty. I have 5 certificates on my account confirming a high level of qualification.

title: Are eyelash extensions safe?
What materials are used?
What is included in the courses?
How to prepare for the procedure?
content: Eyelash extensions can be safe if the procedure is performed by a professional craftsman with quality materials and hygiene. It is important to take into account the health of the eyes and take care of the eyelashes after the procedure.

The quality of the procedure begins with the materials. Here's what you'll definitely need:
Tape - to protect the eyelids and fix the lower eyelashes.
Degreaser and remover - tools for preparing eyelashes before extensions and for their safe removal.
Glue - high-quality, resistant to moisture and temperature changes, because no one wants to eyelashes were peeled off after the first visit to the pool.
Tweezers – for various extension techniques.
Lashes – of different lengths, thicknesses, curves.
All necessary materials and tools for training. Methodical manuals (printed or electronic). International certificate. Support of the teacher within 1 month after the end of the course.
3 days before extensions, you should stop using oils, serums and other eyelash care products. The same applies to dyeing – if it is necessary, it is done in advance, a few days before the procedure.

method: Eyelash correction for up to 3 weeks
Correction of eyebrows + henna for eyebrows

training.title: Training courses
descr_3: Recommendations for getting started: how to find your first customers and grow your business.
training.title_4: What is included in the price of the course
descr_4: All the necessary materials and tools for learning.
Teacher's support for 1 month after completing the course.

section_text: What are eyelash extensions, the main Overview of current trends (1:1, 2D-9D, "Kim Kardashian", wet effect)
Sanitary standards and sterile Rules for working with clients for preservation
Types of eyelashes: natural characteristics and structures How to determine the optimal style of extensions depending on the shape of the eyes.
Overview of tools: tweezers, glue, pads, brushes. Types of false eyelashes: thickness, curves, length, material.
How to organize a comfortable and ergonomic place for work. Psychology of communication with clients.
How to properly prepare natural eyelashes for extensions. Demonstration and practice of eyelash preparation.
Classic build-up (1:1). Volumetric augmentation (2D-9D). Modeling effects: "cat look", "wet effect", "Kim Kardashian".
Glue application technique. How to avoid gluing eyelashes.
Selection of length, curve and volume depending on the client's face. Practice on mannequins.

section_text_head: Photos of works for the portfolio
section_text: Work with the first model under the supervision of the teacher. Error correction and technical improvement.
How to perform correction correctly. The technique of safe removal of eyelash extensions.
How to correct errors and asymmetry. Work with difficult clients.
How to properly photograph your work. Building your own brand in social networks.

PathnamesPage.description:
The pathnames are internationalized too.

If you're using the default language English, you'll see /en/pathnames in the browser address bar on this page.

If you change the locale to German, the URL is localized accordingly (/de/pfadnamen).
